survey_name: Customer Satisfaction Survey for Online Grocery Delivery
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from customers who have used our online grocery delivery service to assess their satisfaction levels and identify areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall online grocery delivery experience?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure satisfaction levels effectively.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall online grocery delivery experience?

questions.question_text: Which of the following aspects of the service did you find most satisfactory? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allows multiple selections to identify key strengths.

script.question_text: Which of the following aspects of the service did you find most satisfactory? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How would you rate the freshness of the groceries delivered?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point scale for granular feedback on product quality.

script.question_text: How would you rate the freshness of the groceries delivered?

questions.question_text: Did you encounter any issues with your order?
questions.client_notes: Binary question to filter respondents who experienced issues.

script.question_text: Did you encounter any issues with your order?

questions.question_text: If you encountered issues, please describe them in detail.
questions.routing_logic: Appears only if Q4 is answered with 'Yes'.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to capture specific issues for resolution.

script.question_text: If you encountered issues, please describe them in detail.
script.routing_logic: Appears only if Q4 is answered with 'Yes'.

questions.question_text: How would you rate the responsiveness of customer service?
questions.client_notes: Include 'Not applicable' for respondents who did not interact with customer service.

script.question_text: How would you rate the responsiveness of customer service?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to use our online grocery delivery service again?

script.question_text: How likely are you to use our online grocery delivery service again?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for our online grocery delivery service?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to capture qualitative feedback for service enhancement.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for our online grocery delivery service?

questions.question_text: How often do you use online grocery delivery services per month?
questions.client_notes: Helps segment respondents by usage frequency.

script.question_text: How often do you use online grocery delivery services per month?

questions.question_text: Which payment method do you prefer for online grocery delivery?
questions.client_notes: Includes an 'Other' option to capture additional methods not listed.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Single-choice with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which payment method do you prefer for online grocery delivery?
